definition: see 麥金塔電腦|麦金塔电脑[Mai4 jin1 ta3 dian4 nao3]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Macintosh (brand of computers made by Apple)/Mac

sentences.english: My first computer ever was a 128K Macintosh.
sentences.chinese: 我第一臺電腦就是128K的麥金塔電腦。

sentences.english: A new game for Mac computers will be released in February.
sentences.chinese: 一款麥金塔電腦上的新遊戲將在二月份發行。
